import React from 'react'; import background from "../components/Images/white-window2.png"; import tiffany from "../components/Images/rndImgNobg.png"; import { FaPhone, FaMapMarkerAlt } from "react-icons/fa"; import ScrollToTop from "../components/ScrollToTop"; import "./styles/Home.css"; const Home = () => { return (

Tiffany Crockett | Portfolio

About Me

Hello, world! I'm Tiffany . . .

A newly trained MERN full stack developer who enjoys the challenge of working with a team to build functional, thoughtful and engaging web applications.

I came to the profession after many years of using website tool builders to design landing pages and basic sites for friends and personal use. When the time was right for a career change, I chose a Full Stack Development program as my foundation for learning to code. That journey solidified my passion for front end web development. I am excited about opportunities to practice my new skills and continue to gain new ones.

My ideal work environment is team-oriented and one that allows everyone's talents to flourish. I find that I work best in an environment that is empowering and positive.

When I am not coding, I enjoy road biking and hiking.

(520) 257-0530
Tucson, AZ
) } export default Home;
